  • Packages that use de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc.nativec 
    Package Description
    de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc
    This is the high level PC/SC wrapper.
    de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc.nativec
    This is the PC/SC native library wrapper part.
  • Classes in de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc.nativec used by de.intarsys.security.smartcard.pcsc 
    Class and Description
    _IPCSC
    This interface mimics the PCSC-Lite/Winscard API.
    _PCSC_RETURN_CODES
    Common PC/SC return and error codes.
    SCARD_READERSTATE
    typedef struct { LPCSTR szReader; // reader name LPVOID pvUserData; // user defined data DWORD dwCurrentState; // current state of reader at time of call DWORD dwEventState; // state of reader after state change DWORD cbAtr; // Number of bytes in the returned ATR.
    SCARDCONTEXT
    The iconified handle to a PC/SC card context
    SCARDHANDLE
    The iconified handle to a PC/SC connection
